decision_conditions: <p>No trees shall be removed as a result of the development hereby approved, without prior written notification and subsequent approval of the Local Planning Authority.</p><p>REASON: To safeguard trees and biodiversity.&nbsp;</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">The proposed rear windows in both the bathroom and shower room located on the second and third floors, shall be obscure glazed.<br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e316b985-7fff-6cec-5de4-b4f6c039e890"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally.</span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Demolition of existing single-storey lower ground floor extension and three-storey rear outrigger and replacement with extended lower ground floor and four-storey rear outrigger extensions, reconfiguration of the rear garden with external stair to the terrace and roof light to existing stairwell.
